One Goldship, hope you like it! <3 #anime #goldship

#wtdraw #ultrakill #lowtier
My first sight and I chose to do the new Province enemy coming in Ultrakills next major update, It is designed for early tiers because of the size but if anyone rally wants I can make one for higher tiers.(no colours attached to the file so you don't have to copy the file to sight presets), this is based on Hakita's released concept art

Install guide : unzip in War Thunder\UserSights ( if the folder does not exist - create it ) then head to Options - Ground vehicle Battle settings - Sight settings and then chose sight in "Reticle" tab

This is my first sight, I will be glad if you download!

#ado #anime

#universal #all_tanks #mbt

MBT Universal sights
Has visual for barrel position and distance visual under reticle.

If you find them small you can increase font size multiplier. It makes the sights bigger or smaller. ->
fontSizeMult:r = 0.6

Custom Sight — Curious Officer Girl

This custom reticle features a calm, curious anime-style girl in an officer-style cap, lying down and looking directly into your sight.

Note: The eagle emblem on her cap is purely decorative and not linked to any ideology. I simply enjoy military fashion and aesthetics. This is not intended as a political reference.

Made for fun and style. If you like unique sights with character, give this one a try.

#anime #officer #waifu #girl #animegirls #art

Incudes 2 variants : Bulky for low magnification optics and Thin for high magnification optics

Install guide : unzip in War Thunder\UserSights ( if the folder does not exist - create it ) then head to Options - Ground vehicle Battle settings - Sight settings and then chose sight in "Reticle" tab //

на удачу)

#sights #meme #memethunder #memes #luckyshot #lucky
Мой сетап прицела, если кому надо. Надо закинуть в папку tank_sights_presets, как дойти до папки UserSights я писал в прошлом посте.

решил сам сделать рисуночек, мне понравилось.

установка кастомного прицела:

1. Скачать архив
2. Распаковать в папку с игрой (если со стима C:\Steam\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\(тут создать папку с названием танка на который хотите прицел, название можно найти на официальной вики выбрав нужный танк и посмотрев в адресной строке, например ussr_t_55_amd_1 и в нее распаковать скачанный прицел), если с лаунчера C:\пользователи\AppData\Local\WarThunderDev\UserSights(тут то же самое).
3. Если игра была запущена перезапустите, выбираете нужный танк, в настройках выбираете основные,...
